page.title: 05WHITTINGTON HALL HOSPITAL
page.content: Hospital for 320 mentally handicapped, male & female, over 16. Trent Regional Hospital Authority. Thirteen wards, with 28-30 beds each. Wards split into flats, with residents in small living groups, like a family. Nurses attached to wards long-term to gain resident's trust. Patients can do own cooking, cleaning & earn money for tasks in therapy sessions, knitting, carpentry, etc. Men's workshop makes & sells bird boxes, plant troughs, tables. Women sell needlework. Proceeds added to welfare funds. Social Centre with teabar & occasional disco. "Rumpus room" for dance & movement. No longer Grace before meals. All residents have annual holiday, Blackpool or Skegness. Relatives visit any time. Patients accepted in locality, invited local clubs for seasonal parties.
